issue.title: Gazebo Splashscreen up forever if plugin blocks during WorldUpdateBegin

content.raw: It is difficult for Gazebo to prevent a plugin from doing something bad, like blocking indefinitely. The plugins we develop and release should behave correctly, and we can help other people developing their own plugins. But we can't easily prevent a plugin from blocking, segfaulting, etc.
